title: SoTL-Based Blended Learning Design to Enhance Long-Term Effects of Faculty Development Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Foundational Knowledge in Instructional Design and Educational Methodologies
context.additional_context: Exploring methods for in-service practitioners to analyze and improve the long-term effects of faculty development programs at both individual growth and organizational culture levels

learning_goals: A systematic framework can be applied to evaluate the long-term effects of faculty development programs using the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL) approach
Strategies can be designed to connect individual professional development with collective practice changes in blended learning environments
The practical impact of faculty development programs can be analyzed, and improvement plans proposed through simulation/VR-based assessments

resources: SoTL (Scholarship of Teaching and Learning) Research Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
